data.title: Christiane Amanpour Sex & Love Around The World
data.text:
Episode 1: Tokyo

In a city of contradictions, how do Japanese women find intimacy and satisfaction?

Episode 2: Delhi

How do women find love and sexual happiness, when they don’t always have the power to say yes or no?

Episode 3: Beirut

How does war impact the way women live and love?

Episode 4: Berlin

What happens when a city with a tolerant, public conversation about sex is joined by people from conservative traditions?

Episode 6: Shanghai

Is Shanghai a city where women are taking control of their identities and their love lives?

Episode 5: Accra

What happens when faith influences every aspect of sex, love and relationships?

Watch full episodes of Christiane Amanpour Sex & Love Around the World

ABOUT THE SHOW

CNN’s award-winning journalist, Christiane Amanpour travels around the world to talk with women about the rules of engagement in relationships and intimacy. In this six-part documentary series, directed by women, Christiane meets regular people who are shaping the idea of modern love. How are roles changing for both men and women when it comes to sex, love, marriage, family and divorce?
